Scenario: Owner exits gracefully with community gratitude after transition completes
    Given Rosa has completed two-year transition steward commitment
    And workers are confidently governing the business democratically
    When Rosa's transition steward role concludes
    Then workers celebrate her choice to enable democratic ownership
    And community honors her as founder who chose workers over individual wealth
    And Rosa exits with consulting income and profound sense of legacy preserved
    And business continues thriving under worker governance
    And workplace_elohim documents successful transition as model for future conversions
